comment: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model OperationTimePeriod adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ACRIS/master/OperationTimePeriod/schema.json
description: Property. The time period over which the Checkpoint is operating.

contents.name: ClosingTime
contents.comment: The date and time from when the Checkpoint Facility is closed. Date time should be UTC, compliant with ISO 8601 format (e.g. 2023-04-20T11:54:59Z)

contents.name: OpeningTime
contents.comment: The date and time from when the Checkpoint Facility is open. Date time should be UTC, compliant with ISO 8601 format (e.g. 2023-04-20T11:54:59Z)
